meta.description: Optimize the production of scooters and bikes to maximize profit given design and engineering time constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the company.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product.

params.name: design_time
params.description: Design team hours required per unit of each product.

params.name: engineering_time
params.description: Engineering team hours required per unit of each product.

params.name: available_design_hours
params.description: Total available hours per month for the design team.

params.name: available_engineering_hours
params.description: Total available hours per month for the engineering team.

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units to produce for each product.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from scooters and bikes.

constraints.name: design_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(design_time[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total design team hours used must not exceed available hours.

constraints.name: engineering_time_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(engineering_time[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total engineering team hours used must not exceed available hours.
